audio_script.text: Driving a car is an essential skill that requires focus, patience, and practice.
audio_script.speaker: narrator_male

audio_script.text: Before starting the car, adjust your seat, mirrors, and ensure your seatbelt is fastened.
audio_script.speaker: narrator_female

audio_script.text: Turn the ignition key or press the start button while keeping your foot on the brake.
audio_script.speaker: narrator_male

audio_script.text: Slowly release the brake and gently press the accelerator to move forward.
audio_script.speaker: narrator_female

audio_script.text: Use the steering wheel to navigate while maintaining a steady speed.
audio_script.speaker: narrator_male
